name: Sham Fashion
tag_list: kaftan, abaya, boubou, shawl, dupatta, fancy-purse
description: Kaftan, Abaya, Boubou, Shawl, Dupatta an
overview:
Established in year 2004, we, “Sham Fashion”, are among the prominent organizations engaged in manufacturing and supplying Different Types of Garments like Kaftans, Abaya, Boubou, Shawl, Dupatta, Fancy Purses, Jewellery 2gm and others.

Our Team: Supported by our talented and experienced professionals, we are able to place ourselves among the reputed organizations of the market.

Infrastructure: We have constructed an ultra-modern infrastructure facility for having streamlined execution of all the tasks. Our infrastructure is well equipped with advanced machines and tools, which are essential for having trouble free and higher production process.

Quality Assurance: Our organization gives top most top priority to the quality standard of our products. Thus, our professionals ensure to follow industry laid guidelines and prevailing fashion trends while manufacturing products offered by us.

Client Satisfaction: In order to become the leading organization of the market, we make sure to satisfy our customers. All the products offered by us comply with prevailing market trends and are available at economical prices.

Our Collection:

Designer Kaftan Designer Farasha Designer Abaya Short Abaya Designer Hijab Chiffon Boubou
